name: React Fundamentals
description: An introduction to the basics of React, including components, JSX, and state management.

lessons.name: JSX and Components
lessons.description: Understanding JSX syntax and building reusable components.

lessons.name: State and Props
lessons.description: Managing component state and passing data using props in React.

lessons.name: Event Handling
lessons.description: Handling user interactions and events in React applications.

name: Advanced React Concepts
description: Exploring React Hooks, Context API, and performance optimization techniques.

lessons.name: React Hooks (useState, useEffect)
lessons.description: Utilizing hooks to manage state and side effects in functional components.

lessons.name: Context API
lessons.description: Managing global state with Context API in React applications.

lessons.name: Performance Optimization
lessons.description: Improving React performance with memoization, lazy loading, and code splitting.

name: React Routing and State Management
description: Implementing navigation and state management in large-scale React applications.

lessons.name: React Router Basics
lessons.description: Setting up and using React Router for navigation.

lessons.name: Dynamic and Nested Routing
lessons.description: Creating dynamic and nested routes with React Router.

lessons.name: State Management with Redux
lessons.description: Using Redux for managing global state in React applications.

name: Angular Fundamentals
description: An introduction to Angular's core concepts, including components, templates, and data binding.

lessons.name: Introduction to Angular and Setup
lessons.description: Understanding Angular architecture and setting up an Angular project.

lessons.name: Components and Templates
lessons.description: Building Angular components and using templates to define UI structure.

lessons.name: Data Binding and Event Handling
lessons.description: Exploring property binding, event binding, and two-way data binding in Angular.

name: Advanced Angular Concepts
description: Exploring Angular services, dependency injection, and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Dependency Injection and Services
lessons.description: Understanding Angular's dependency injection system and using services for data management.

lessons.name: Directives and Pipes
lessons.description: Creating custom directives and pipes to manipulate the DOM and format data.

lessons.name: Angular Performance Optimization
lessons.description: Improving performance using lazy loading, change detection strategies, and onPush.

name: Angular Routing and State Management
description: Implementing navigation and managing state in Angular applications.

lessons.name: Angular Router Basics
lessons.description: Setting up navigation using Angular Router.

lessons.name: Lazy Loading Modules
lessons.description: Optimizing Angular applications by loading modules on demand.

lessons.name: State Management with NgRx
lessons.description: Using NgRx to manage global state in Angular applications.

name: Database Fundamentals
description: An introduction to databases, relational models, and SQL fundamentals.

lessons.name: Introduction to Databases
lessons.description: Understanding the basics of databases, types, and their applications.

lessons.name: Relational Model and ER Diagrams
lessons.description: Exploring entity-relationship diagrams and relational database concepts.

lessons.name: SQL Basics
lessons.description: Writing basic SQL queries including SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE.

name: Advanced Database Concepts
description: Deep dive into database normalization, indexing, and transactions.

lessons.name: Normalization and Schema Design
lessons.description: Understanding normalization forms and designing efficient schemas.

lessons.name: Indexing and Query Optimization
lessons.description: Using indexes and optimizing SQL queries for performance.

lessons.name: Transactions and Concurrency Control
lessons.description: Managing transactions, ACID properties, and handling concurrency issues.

name: NoSQL and Big Data
description: Exploring NoSQL databases, their advantages, and big data concepts.

lessons.name: Introduction to NoSQL
lessons.description: Understanding NoSQL databases and their use cases.

lessons.name: Types of NoSQL Databases
lessons.description: Exploring key-value, document, column-family, and graph databases.

lessons.name: Big Data and Distributed Databases
lessons.description: Introduction to distributed databases and big data technologies like Hadoop and Spark.

name: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: An introduction to machine learning concepts, types, and core algorithms.

lessons.name: Introduction to Machine Learning
lessons.description: Understanding machine learning, types, and real-world applications.

lessons.name: Supervised vs. Unsupervised Learning
lessons.description: Differentiating between supervised and unsupervised learning techniques.

lessons.name: Regression and Classification
lessons.description: Exploring regression and classification models with real-world examples.

name: Model Training and Optimization
description: Techniques for training machine learning models and optimizing their performance.

lessons.name: Data Preprocessing and Feature Engineering
lessons.description: Cleaning datasets and transforming features for better model performance.

lessons.name: Model Evaluation Metrics
lessons.description: Using metrics like accuracy, precision, recall, and F1-score to evaluate models.

lessons.name: Hyperparameter Tuning and Optimization
lessons.description: Using techniques like grid search and random search for model optimization.

name: Deep Learning and Neural Networks
description: Introduction to deep learning concepts, neural networks, and frameworks.

lessons.name: Introduction to Neural Networks
lessons.description: Understanding artificial neural networks and their applications.

lessons.name: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs)
lessons.description: Exploring CNNs for image processing and classification tasks.

lessons.name: Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) and LSTMs
lessons.description: Understanding RNNs and LSTMs for sequential data processing.

name: Introduction to Embedded Systems
description: Understanding the basics of embedded systems, microcontrollers, and real-time processing.

lessons.name: Overview of Embedded Systems
lessons.description: Introduction to embedded systems, their applications, and key components.

lessons.name: Microcontrollers and Microprocessors
lessons.description: Understanding microcontrollers, their architecture, and programming.

lessons.name: Real-Time Operating Systems (RTOS)
lessons.description: Exploring RTOS concepts, scheduling, and task management.

name: Embedded System Design and Development
description: Techniques for designing and developing embedded systems, including hardware-software integration.

lessons.name: Hardware-Software Co-Design
lessons.description: Understanding how hardware and software interact in embedded systems.

lessons.name: Interfacing with Sensors and Actuators
lessons.description: Connecting embedded systems to external hardware components.

lessons.name: Communication Protocols (UART, I2C, SPI)
lessons.description: Using serial communication protocols for embedded system integration.

name: Embedded Systems Applications and Optimization
description: Exploring practical applications, optimization techniques, and power management in embedded systems.

lessons.name: Low Power Design in Embedded Systems
lessons.description: Techniques to optimize power consumption for battery-operated devices.

lessons.name: Embedded Systems Security
lessons.description: Implementing security measures for embedded applications.

lessons.name: Embedded Systems in IoT
lessons.description: Integrating embedded systems with Internet of Things (IoT) applications.

name: Cloud Computing Fundamentals
description: An introduction to cloud computing concepts, models, and service providers.

lessons.name: Introduction to Cloud Computing
lessons.description: Understanding cloud computing, its benefits, and common use cases.

lessons.name: Cloud Service Models (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS)
lessons.description: Exploring different cloud service models and their applications.

lessons.name: Cloud Deployment Models
lessons.description: Understanding public, private, hybrid, and multi-cloud architectures.

name: Cloud Infrastructure and Services
description: Exploring cloud platforms, storage, and networking services.

lessons.name: Virtualization and Containers
lessons.description: Understanding virtualization technologies and containerization with Docker.

lessons.name: Cloud Storage Services
lessons.description: Exploring cloud storage options like AWS S3, Google Cloud Storage, and Azure Blob Storage.

lessons.name: Cloud Networking and Security
lessons.description: Understanding cloud networking concepts and security best practices.

name: Cloud Application Deployment and Management
description: Learning how to deploy, manage, and monitor cloud-based applications.

lessons.name: Serverless Computing
lessons.description: Introduction to serverless computing with AWS Lambda, Azure Functions, and Google Cloud Functions.

lessons.name: CI/CD in the Cloud
lessons.description: Implementing continuous integration and deployment using cloud-based tools.

lessons.name: Cloud Monitoring and Logging
lessons.description: Using tools like AWS CloudWatch, Azure Monitor, and Google Cloud Logging for cloud application monitoring.

name: Introduction to Kafka
description: Understanding the fundamentals of Apache Kafka and its architecture.

lessons.name: Overview of Apache Kafka
lessons.description: Understanding Kafka as a distributed event streaming platform and its key use cases.

lessons.name: Kafka Architecture and Components
lessons.description: Exploring Kafka topics, producers, consumers, partitions, and brokers.

lessons.name: Kafka Installation and Setup
lessons.description: Setting up a local Kafka cluster and running a basic producer-consumer example.

name: Working with Kafka Producers and Consumers
description: Learning how to produce and consume messages in Apache Kafka.

lessons.name: Kafka Producers
lessons.description: Implementing Kafka producers, configuring partitions, and sending messages.

lessons.name: Kafka Consumers and Consumer Groups
lessons.description: Understanding consumer groups, message offsets, and load balancing.

lessons.name: Handling Data Streams in Kafka
lessons.description: Managing high-throughput real-time data streams using Kafka.

name: Kafka Stream Processing and Integration
description: Exploring Kafka Streams, Connect, and integration with big data systems.

lessons.name: Kafka Streams API
lessons.description: Building real-time data processing applications using Kafka Streams.

lessons.name: Kafka Connect and Data Pipelines
lessons.description: Using Kafka Connect for data integration with databases and external systems.

lessons.name: Monitoring and Securing Kafka
lessons.description: Implementing logging, monitoring, and security best practices for Kafka clusters.

name: Python Basics
description: An introduction to Python programming, covering syntax, data types, and basic operations.

lessons.name: Introduction to Python
lessons.description: Understanding Python's history, installation, and running basic scripts.

lessons.name: Variables and Data Types
lessons.description: Exploring Python's data types, including integers, floats, strings, and booleans.

lessons.name: Control Flow and Loops
lessons.description: Using if-else conditions, for loops, and while loops to control program flow.

name: Functions and Data Structures
description: Understanding functions, lists, dictionaries, and tuples in Python.

lessons.name: Defining and Calling Functions
lessons.description: Creating and using functions with parameters and return values.

lessons.name: Lists, Tuples, and Dictionaries
lessons.description: Working with different data structures and their operations.

lessons.name: List Comprehensions and Lambda Functions
lessons.description: Using list comprehensions and lambda functions for concise code.

name: Object-Oriented Programming and File Handling
description: Exploring object-oriented programming concepts and file operations in Python.

lessons.name: Classes and Objects
lessons.description: Understanding object-oriented programming with classes and instances.

lessons.name: File Handling in Python
lessons.description: Reading, writing, and working with files in Python.

lessons.name: Error Handling and Exceptions
lessons.description: Using try-except blocks to handle errors in Python programs.
